about_the_game:
Evil forces invaded the world and converted everyone to futanari, greatly increasing their sexual lust. The civilization collapsed immediately as almost everyone fell under the influence of the invaders, seeking only pleasure. Those under their control became feral, lusting for constant sexual intercourse, and becoming increasingly angry and destructive when they don't get satisfied. The invaders feed off the emotions of sexual frustration, greatly increasing their power.

You're the only person who is immune to the conversion, and you are trying to find a cure and restore humanity. You managed to develop a serum which can quickly restore free will in those who became feral, but you have to be careful, as every one of the enemies can sense you and will immediately become lusting for you from a great distance.

Features:

- Unique combination of match 3 puzzle gameplay and erotic visual novel scenes.
- Incredibly sexy female protagonist
- Luscious pixel artwork throughout.
- Immerse yourself in a fantasy world full of futanari girls.
- Can be played with one hand.
- Some of the art is created with AI image generation.

Gameplay:

Match tokens to control the actions of your character as she progresses through the levels, fighting various enemies. You have to match the right tokens to perform the specific actions, like healing yourself or damaging the enemy.

The story is a linear progression through levels combined with visual novel elements narrating what's happening and telling the story of the game. As you progress you'll uncover the main storyline and you'll play a series of match 3 puzzle games against different opponents.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.

The game also contains instances of sexual assault and non-consensual sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Evil forces invaded the world and converted everyone to futanari, greatly increasing their sexual lust, and feeding on the emotional power of their sexual frustration. You're the only female immune to the conversion and everyone around you wants to fuck you! Match 3 puzzle meets visual novel!
